Create: create table if not exists OmMenu (ID integer not null,ParentID integer,Name text,IsGroup integer,ViewName text,Params text,Icon text,SrvName text,Note text,DispIdx integer,primary key (ID))
create index if not exists "OmMenu_ParentID" on "OmMenu"("ParentID")
OmMenu.Data: select * from cm_menu where islocked=0 order by dispidx

Create: create table if not exists OmBaseCode (ID text not null,Grp text,primary key (ID))
create index if not exists "OmBaseCode_Grp" on "OmBaseCode"("Grp")
OmBaseCode.Data: select id,grp from cm_res order by dispidx

Create: create table if not exists OmReport (ID integer not null,Name text,Define text,primary key (ID))
create table if not exists RoleMenu (RoleID integer,MenuID integer)
create index if not exists "RoleMenu_RoleID" on "RoleMenu"("RoleID")
RoleMenu.Data: select a.* from cm_rolemenu a,cm_menu b where a.menuid=b.id and b.islocked=0

Create: create table if not exists RolePrv (RoleID integer,PrvID text)
create table if not exists Notice (ID text not null,Title text,Ctime text,primary key (ID))
